thread.title: Garth Brooks tickets go on sale Friday for San Jose dates
thread.title_full: Garth Brooks tickets go on sale Friday for San Jose dates

author:
Jim Harrington

jharrington@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: Garth Brooks tickets go on sale Friday for San Jose dates
text:
Garth Brooks tickets go on sale Friday for San Jose dates By Jim Harrington Posted: 10/08/2015 05:44:35 AM PDT Updated: 10/08/2015 09:44:57 PM PDT Get ready Garth Brooks fans. Tickets for the multiplatinum country star's shows at the SAP Center go on sale Friday. 
Brooks performs Nov. 13-14 at the San Jose venue. It's his first appearances in San Jose in 18 years. 
Brooks' wife, Trisha Yearwood, is also on the bill. 
Tickets are $65.73 and go on sale at 10 a.m. Oct. 9, www.ticketmaster.com/garthbrooks . 
The 53-year-old Oklahoma native is one of the most successful artists of all time. With over 136 million albums sold, Brooks ranks as the top-selling solo artist in U.S. history -- just ahead of Elvis Presley. He ranks No. 2 on the overall list, with only the Beatles surpassing his numbers. NASHVILLE, TN - SEPTEMBER 10: Garth Brooks receives The Music City Ambassador Award as part of Honorees Garth Brooks and Trisha Yearwood being Inducted into The Nashville Walk Of Fame on September 10, 2015 in Nashville, Tennessee. (Photo by Rick Diamond/Getty Images) ( Rick Diamond ) 
While most artists dream of going gold or platinum, Brooks boasts an astonishing half dozen albums that have received diamond certification -- signifying sales of over 10 million. 
At the height of his career, Brooks retired from performing and recording in 2001 so as to concentrate on his family. 
His lengthy comeback has had many stages, including a five-year residency in Las Vegas that kicked off in 2009. 
Last year, Brooks finally launched his current world tour. He is supporting his ninth studio album, "Man Against Machine," which is his first since 2001's "Scarecrow." 
Follow Jim Harrington at twitter.com/jimthecritic and www.facebook.com/jim.bayareanews . Advertisement
